updateNotes: We've made some sweet updates! Enjoy our new levels, improved performance, and bug fixes to make your Candy Crush experience even better.

What's new:
- Squashed some bugs and improved performance.
- You can now react to messages with any emoji.
- Huddles are now more reliable.
Introducing new database templates and faster page loads. We've also fixed over 50 small bugs to make your workspace smoother.
The Aubbay Surfers World Tour continues in sunny Barcelona! Explore the vibrant city streets and surf on top of the famous Gaudi-inspired buildings.
